message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we both lose money over time.
My turn, Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but we both know time is money.  Let's close this deal.
Bob, we're losing money fast.  My previous offer was more than fair. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you something to avoid us both getting nothing. Don't be greedy.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm making a compromise.  Don't let this opportunity slip away.
